data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pesic, Vladimir, Piccoli, Gustavo Caue de Oliveira, de Araujo, Marcel Santos, Rezende, Jose Marcos (2015): A new genus of water mites (Acari, Hydrachnidia, Wettinidae) from bromeliad phytotelmata in the Brazilian Atlantic rainforest. ZooKeys 516: 27-33, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.516.10179, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.516.10179
